summary: When a suburban couple go camping for the weekend at a remote beach, they discover that nature isn't in an accommodating mood.
cast: John Hargreaves|Briony Behets|Mike McEwen|Roy Day|Michael Aitkens|Sue Kiss von Soly|Colin Eggleston
keywords: topless woman|camping|ozploitation|killing an animal|nature takes revenge
title: Largo fin de semana
